trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed> event is raised when authorization has failed and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> (WSFAM) is determining whether to redirect to an identity provider (STS).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed>授權失敗時，就會引發事件和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>(WSFAM) 會決定是否要重新導向至識別提供者 (STS)。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.AuthorizationFailed>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A> property to determine whether the redirect runtime logic will be called by WSFAM.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A>屬性來判斷是否會被 WSFAM 呼叫重新導向執行階段邏輯。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs.RedirectToIdentityProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.AuthorizationFailedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the runtime (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) should redirect to an identity provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否執行階段 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) 應重新導向至識別提供者。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to redirect; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要重新導向。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
